name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Platform Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in optimizing GPU-based infrastructure and managing cloud environments, primarily using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. My technical expertise includes deploying applications on **Red Hat OpenShift** and orchestrating containerized solutions with **Kubernetes**. I am proficient in utilizing **NVIDIA GPU ecosystem** technologies including **CUDA**, **cuDNN**, and **TensorRT**, which enhances the efficiency of machine learning workloads. My hands-on experience with **Slurm** for cluster management and **Triton Inference Server** for model serving positions me to deliver high-performance solutions tailored to demanding data analysis needs. 

Coupled with my robust skills in **MLOps** and **LLMOps**, I have successfully implemented workflows that integrate **Triton** and **RAPIDS** for accelerated data processing while ensuring compliance with industry standards. I also have a strong foundation in automation using **Terraform**, **Helm charts**, and **Ansible**, which streamline deployment processes. My background in developing enterprise-grade platforms is complemented by a commitment to collaboration and clear communication, making me an effective team player in cross-functional environments.
